title: 服务器问题
author: cocozc007
txt_content:
我想问一下server.properties文件里的server-ip=要输入自己的IP吗？如果输入，Minecraft_Server里跳[INFO] Starting minecraft server version Beta 1.3[INFO] Loading properties
[INFO] Starting Minecraft server on 218.82.203.138:25565
[WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind
[WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
这段话怎么办？
感激不尽!

replies.author: vintene
replies.txt_content:
应该是这样设定的
#Minecraft server properties
#Sat Mar 12 11:42:26 EST 2011
level-name=world
hellworld=false
spawn-monsters=true
online-mode=false
spawn-animals=true
max-players=2
server-ip=填你的ip
pvp=true
server-port=25565
white-list=false

replies.author: cocozc007
replies.txt_content: 这问题和操作系统有关系吗？

replies.author: vintene
replies.txt_content:
回复 cocozc007 的帖子

应该没有，你检查一个java装好没有，ip输对没有，应该没有太大问题。
我家两台电脑都是这么设置的，都可以互联，就是机器太老，巨卡，只能玩单机

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 你用的是无线路由器上网的吗？如果是，那你是不能用路由器的。我以前也是这样。
